title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\LoggingConfig
name: LoggingConfig
description:
Defines logging behavior for conversation lifecycle events.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.LoggingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_stackdriver_logging
params.description: Whether to log conversation events like [CONVERSATION_STARTED][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.ConversationEvent.Type.CONVERSATION_STARTED] to Stackdriver in the conversation project as JSON format [ConversationEvent][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.ConversationEvent] protos.
